definition: in touch with the people/sensitive to people's needs
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: and it's much more relevant and less pompous than it used to be.
sentences.chinese: 它与过去相比更亲民，不那么傲慢了。

sentences.english: a lot of people have really connected with them and their energy.
sentences.chinese: 很多人都觉得王子们的气质很亲民。

sentences.english: PFP retail prices showing to the public.
sentences.chinese: 亲民零售价格呈现于众。

sentences.english: There are all sorts of quibbles to be raised against this renewed emphasis on niceness.
sentences.chinese: 有各式的借口可提出来反对再次强调亲民姿态。

definition: in touch with the common people/down-to-earth
reasonably priced/inexpensive/to keep prices down/(currency exchange) parity
amiable and approachable (idiom); easy-going/modest and unassuming/(of writing) plain and simple/easy to understand
(slang) high-end, elegant, and classy/abbr. for 高端大氣上檔次|高端大气上档次
the masses/the great bulk of the population/popular (of music, science etc)
to set a price/to fix a price
minority of the population/non-mainstream (activity, pursuit etc)/niche (market etc)
